svg.source:
participant Master participant Agent participant ZK participant AdminRouter
on Master participant IAM participant DC/OS CA
on Master Master->ZK: Master Bootstrap Secrets Note over ZK: Master Secrets Consensus Master->ZK: Agent Bootstrap Secrets Note over ZK: Agent Secrets Consensus Note over AdminRouter
on Master: Generate private key AdminRouter
on Master->DC/OS CA
on Master: CSR via localhost DC/OS CA
on Master->AdminRouter
on Master: Signed Certificate Master->IAM: Create dcos_agent Svc Acc via localhost Note over IAM: account created Agent->ZK: Fetch Agent Secrets Agent->ZK: Fetch CA Certificate Agent->AdminRouter
on Master: dcos_agent Svc Acc Login over HTTPS AdminRouter
on Master->IAM: proxies request Note over Agent: Generate private key Agent->DC/OS CA
on Master: Certificate Signing Request (CSR) DC/OS CA
on Master->Agent: Signed Certificate Note over Agent: mesos-agent with SSL starts

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-family: "Andale Mono", monospace; font-size: 16px;
